attributes.action: Lower the voting age to 15 in Scotland
attributes.background: I want the government to give scotland its fair vote due to the mass population of England to Scotland

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government and Scottish Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/

You may also wish to contact your local MSP who represents you about this issue. 

You can find the name of your local MSP and how to contact them here: https://www.parliament.scot/msps
